sentences.sContent: She works in the hairdresser’s as an apprentice.

remMethod.val: apprent(看作apprehend， 领会， 理解) + ice(表人) → (学着)领会理解的人 → 学徒； 初学者

trans.tranCn: 学徒， 徒弟； 初学者； 实习生
trans.tranOther: someone who works for an employer for a fixed period of time in order to learn a particular skill or job
